thread.title: Homeless man goes wild after being offered job | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Homeless man goes wild after being offered job | Daily Mail Online

author: Charlie Moore For Mailonline
title: Homeless man goes wild after being offered job | Daily Mail Online
text: comments This is the heartwarming moment a homeless man cheered after he landed a job and received his first week's wages. The unidentified man pumped his arms and ran across the road with delight after he was offered a permanent contract at a window supplier yesterday. He was given the job after a trial period at Central RPL in West Bromwich, not far from where he lives at a homeless shelter in Wolverhampton. This is the heartwarming moment a homeless man cheered after he landed a job and received his first week's wages Aaron Doyle, who works at Central RPL, shared the tear-jerking video online. He said: 'It might seem like nothing to most, but this guy has really won me over. His reaction as he left was absolutely priceless.' He said the man gets food from a church and has 'absolutely nothing' but still offers him a chocolate bar and a bit of his coffee every morning. RELATED ARTICLES
